text: But I have 2:20 this ¦ a few things ANT TRthis against yoʋ: Yoʋ 2:20 tolerate … prophetess while teaching and seducing ¦ allow … prophetess, to teach and seduce TRtolerate 2:20 yoʋr wife 70% ¦ the woman CT TR 27.2%yoʋr wife Jezebel, who calls herself a prophetess while teaching and seducing my servants to commit fornication and eat food sacrificed to idols.
